scripts.live-test: . .env && aws --profile $AWS_PROFILE lambda invoke --function-name $AWS_FUNCTION_NAME --invocation-type RequestResponse --region $AWS_REGION --log-type Tail --cli-binary-format raw-in-base64-out --payload file://tests/testData/notconfigued.json response.json
scripts.live-test-2: . .env && aws --profile $AWS_PROFILE lambda invoke --function-name $AWS_FUNCTION_NAME --invocation-type RequestResponse --region $AWS_REGION --log-type Tail --cli-binary-format raw-in-base64-out --payload '{"foo":"bar"}' /dev/null
scripts.DEPLOY: . .env && npm run-script compile && bash ../../scripts/publish.sh -f $AWS_FUNCTION_NAME -p $AWS_PROFILE -r $AWS_REGION && npm run tf:init && npm run tf:apply && bash ../../scripts/cleanup.sh
